detailsOfAchievement: Bark India Charitable Trust is a registered organization (Reg., No.2083/15) operating in and around Pondicherry and Villipuram, Tamil Nadu. We rescue, only street sick/accident animals, which needs immediate medical care. After the rescue we take them to our rescue center and there we provide good health care, food and accommodation. When the animal is survivable, we sterilize and vaccinate them against rabies and then we send the street dogs back to the environment where they came from. In addition we are doing Animal Birth Control and Anti Rabies program for the community dog and pet animals.

detailsOfAchievement: We have imparted training on new agricultural technologies to nearly 1500 farmers adopting organic farming practices and SRI technology over 500 acres. We formed Self Help Groups and initiated one women federation and one farmer federation. We have set up model integrated farm to demonstrate the susutainable agricultural practices to the farmers. Environmental awareness training to 30 schools in Puducherry. Successfully introduced vermi composting technology in Puducherry and nearly 170 members are producing vermi compost from farm waste in rural villages. Mobilized Rs.2 crores from the nationalized banks to the Self Help Groups. Guiding the agricultural graduates for the agriculture related enterprises. Adopted one village under village development programme supported by NABARD.We initiated one training institute to impart training on microenterprises and new agricultural technologies to the rural poor and farming communities.
